title: CNBC Daily Open: Powell flipped the script
description: The Federal Reserve hiked interest rates by a quarter point, as markets had expected. They didn't expect Powell's warnings on the economy.

title: Yellen's comments rattled the market, not the Fed rate hike, Jim Cramer says
description: The Federal Reserve's quarter-point rate hike "seems just right," said CNBC's Jim Cramer.

title: Coinbase warned by SEC of potential securities charges
description: The SEC issued crypto exchange Coinbase a Wells notice, warning the exchange that it identified potential violations of U.S. securities law.

title: SEC charges TRON founder Justin Sun, celebrities Lindsay Lohan, Jake Paul with crypto violations
description: The SEC unveiled charges against diplomat Justin Sun for fraud and securities violations, while charging celebrity backers including Jake Paul and Lindsey Lohan.

title: Financial conditions are tightening after SVB's collapse and could slow the economy, Powell says
description: The regional banking crisis could slow the U.S. economy even as deposits stabilize, the Fed chair said.

title: Treasury will do whatever it takes to ensure 'savings remain safe,' Yellen tells senators
description: Following SVB collapse, regulators will do whatever it takes to protect deposits in U.S. banks, Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen told senators.

title: Fed hikes rates by a quarter percentage point, indicates increases are near an end
description: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday released its decision on interest rates following a two-day meeting.

title: XRP cryptocurrency jumps as investors hope Ripple will win legal battle with the SEC
description: XRP, a cryptocurrency closely associated with Ripple, surged over 11% on Wednesday as investors grew hopeful the firm would win its legal battle with the SEC.

title: 'Do you think I enjoy doing this reform?': France's Macron breaks silence after overriding parliament
description: "The longer we wait the worse the situation will get," France's Emmanuel Macron insisted of his pension reforms amid widespread strikes and protests.

title: JPMorgan Chase buys data platform for startups in push to serve venture capital investors
description: The deal is the latest in a string of fintech acquisitions made under CEO Jamie Dimon. Since 2020, JPMorgan has acquired a half-dozen startups.

title: Multiple people injured after ship dislodged at Scottish dry dock
description: Fifteen people were transported to the hospital after the ship toppled over.

title: Here's everything the Federal Reserve is expected to do Wednesday
description: The Fed will close its two-day meeting Wednesday with a heavy air of uncertainty.

title: Goldman Sachs is using ChatGPT-style A.I. in house to assist developers with writing code
description: Goldman Sachs developers are internally using generative AI tools to assist their code writing, according to a top executive at the bank.

title: DCG-owned crypto exchange Luno replaces CEO, seeks outside investment after layoffs
description: Marcus Swanepoel, the CEO of crypto exchange Luno, is now executive chairman. He'll focus on helping Luno seek funding from investors other than DCG.

title: Euro pushes higher as ECB chief Lagarde says inflation is still too high
description: The euro pushed higher against the U.S. dollar following comments from the European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde that inflation is "still high."

title: UK inflation rate breaks 3-month stretch of declines with surprise rise to 10.4%
description: U.K. inflation unexpectedly jumped in February as food and energy bills continued to soar, placing further pressure on households.

title: 'Cannabis in Germany will be a success story': Europe's biggest economy moves closer to weed legalization
description: Germany could be weeks away from introducing a bill to legalize cannabis — a move that would make it the world’s largest regulated national market for the drug.

title: China and Russia affirm economic cooperation for the next several years
description: Chinese President Xi Jinping and Russian President Vladimir Putin have agreed to cooperate on a range of economic and business areas.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Janet Yellen's guarantee to banks comes with a catch
description: Regional banks popped after Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said the government might guarantee deposits. But banks lost ground again in after-hours trading.

title: Geely shares jump after automaker beats revenue expectations for 2022
description: For 2023, Geely set a sales target of 1.65 million units and said it aims to double the share of new energy and electrified vehicle sales.

title: Give us your nominations: CNBC is ranking the world's top fintech companies
description: CNBC and independent research firm Statista are going to identify the world's top 200 fintech companies.

title: Gold prices could notch an all-time high soon — and stay there
description: Gold prices have room to run as banks struggle and the Federal Reserve renders another rate decision, potentially breaking all-time highs — and staying there.

title: Virgin Orbit returning 'small' team from unpaid pause on Thursday to prep for next rocket launch
description: Virgin Orbit is returning a "small team" to work on Thursday, as the company aims to prepare for its next rocket launch even as its future remains in doubt.

title: 'Inundated with requests': Digital currency firms look to Swiss banks after crypto-friendly lenders fail
description: Crypto firms are scrambling to find institutions to bank with after the collapse of Signature Bank and Silvergate Capital.

title: Finland is the world's happiest country. Now it's giving away free trips to show travelers why
description: Finland has been named the happiest country in the world for six years in a row. Now it's planning a masterclass to teach people it's a skill — not a mindset.

title: Traveling to Asia for work? This city is its most expensive business destination
description: A business trip now costs an average of $520 a day in Hong Kong, and Singapore follows closely behind at $515.
